cannibalization_assessment.potential_conflict: SoftStream Yoga Pant vs. Align High-Rise Pant
cannibalization_assessment.analysis: Both target same demographic, similar price, yoga category. SoftStream may cannibalize Align sales.
cannibalization_assessment.market_preference_data: Current consumers show 73% preference for Nulu fabric over new soft fabrics
cannibalization_assessment.recommendation: PAUSE SoftStream launch. Align is proven bestseller; new entry risks splitting loyal customer base without clear differentiation.

cannibalization_assessment.potential_conflict: Align Ultra-High Rise vs. Standard Align
cannibalization_assessment.analysis: Line extension of bestseller, slight cannibalization expected but acceptable
cannibalization_assessment.market_preference_data: 38% of customers request higher rise option
cannibalization_assessment.recommendation: PROCEED. Minimal cannibalization, addresses customer feedback, expands Align franchise.

cannibalization_assessment.potential_conflict: FlowState Lounge Set vs. Scuba Cropped Hoodie
cannibalization_assessment.analysis: Both loungewear, overlapping demographics, similar price points when compared per-piece
cannibalization_assessment.market_preference_data: Set buyers vs. separates buyers show 62% overlap
cannibalization_assessment.recommendation: LAUNCH SEQUENTIALLY. Space launches by 4-6 weeks to assess independent demand before potential overlap.

cannibalization_assessment.potential_conflict: Scuba Cropped vs. Scuba Oversized Half-Zip
cannibalization_assessment.analysis: Same Scuba family, but different silhouettes appeal to different occasions
cannibalization_assessment.market_preference_data: Cropped style requests up 41% in customer feedback
cannibalization_assessment.recommendation: PROCEED. Product differentiation sufficient; extends successful Scuba line.
